txt.en: You have succeeded in defending the door to the Hornburg

The enemy plans to breach the Hornburg through a gate-house being used as a makeshift infirmary for the wounded. The wounded men and the supplies of bandages and medicines are in danger, but the door to the Hornburg must be protected at all costs.

The enemy plans to breach the Hornburg through a gate-house being used as a makeshift infirmary for the wounded. The wounded men and the supplies of bandages and medicines are in danger, but the door to the Hornburg must be protected at all costs. Heal the men if you are able, and be warned that the goblins mean to destroy the banners upon the wall during their assault.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Door takes structural damage
* Wounded Rohirrim is defeated

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Crate of bandages and healing supplies destroyed
The door to the Hornburg has been destroyed
<rgb=#FF0000>The door to the Hornburg has been damaged</rgb>
'Ohh, the pain! Can any spare some attention?'
Do not allow the door to the Hornburg to be destroyed

The enemy plans to breach the Hornburg through a gate-house being used as a makeshift infirmary for the wounded. The wounded men and the supplies of bandages and medicines are in danger, but the door to the Hornburg must be protected at all costs.

'This wound needs a bandage! Please lend your aid!'
'The world grows darker... please save me!'
'If I do not receive care I will surely perish!'
Defeat the waves of attackers assailing the gate-house ([placeholder]/6)
